column4: every time i try to move a file/folder in /home/keres/games/ it always says permission denied.
every time i try to move a file/folder in /home/keres/games/ it always says permission denied.
probably that directory isn't owned by you. Try sudo chown -R keres:keres /home/keres/games/
explanation: sudo makes the command run with administrator privilages, chown CHanges OWNer, -R does it for all directories in the place you specify, keres:keres is the user:group to change it to
